title: Forensics: Crash Scene Investigators
overview: Brand new series â€˜Forensics: Crash Scene Investigation' goes inside the life changing incidents encountered by Yorkshire's forensic collision investigators as they use the latest technology and detective work to find out what went tragically wrong.Each episode is a unique insight into how the Crash Investigators assess the scene of a collision, gradually piecing together what's happened. They are the voice of the victim and often the only ones that can provide answers to families with answers of what happened to their loved ones.
